doc.title: The Beholder
doc.plot: The Beholder is a light-hearted contemplation of one man's perception of beauty. Adam - a City failure now living on Hampstead Heath - shares the company of the world's greatest philosophical minds as he struggles to grasp the troublesome relationship between our hearts and eyes, and the seemingly inexplicable decisions people make when looking for love. Our scholar's conclusions are thrown into disarray upon the arrival of a mysterious new muse, and it soon becomes apparent that mother knows best.
